summary: This mod is a re-texture of the Demon Hunter Armor by jmenaru. There are three separate colors to choose from: violet, blue, and green. This is not a standalone mod, so you will only be able to use one of the re-textures.
descriptionHtml:
Demon Hunter Re-texture by CrimsonFairy

NOTE: This mod is just a texture replacer, and only contains the textures! You still need the original mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27060/]here[/url].

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Description
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
This mod is a re-texture of the Demon Hunter Armor by jmenaru. There are three seperate colors to choose from: violet, blue, and green. This is not a standalone mod, so you will only be able to use one of the re-textures. See the images to choose which one you like best. You can always download a different one if you don\'t like the first one you downloaded. Colors may be brighter, darker, more or less saturated depending on what graphic enhancers or ENBs you use. I didn\'t use any mods like that in the screens so you could see the original color scheme.

I\'m no longer making retextures for this set, so please do not request any.

Please do not ask me to make a standalone version, because I don\'t have permission nor the time to make one.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Requirements
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Just the original mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27060/]here[/url].

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Install/Uninstall
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Extract files from archive into Skryim data folder. Click yes to all, and when asked to overwrite anything say yes. And that\'s it!

Go to Data/Textures/armor/Demon_Hunter and delete armor_d boots_d and gloves_d. Or just overwrite the textures with the original ones.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Credits
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bethesda for obvious reasons.
jmenaru for making the original armor and for letting me retexture it.
And the Nexus creators and staff for their awesome work and website.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Usage/Permission
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
You are not allowed to upload this mod to any other site without mine and jmenaru\'s permission. And you are not allowed to use this in any of your own mods without mine and jmenaru\'s permission either.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bugs/incompatibilities
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
No bugs that I know of. Please let me know if you find any!
author: CrimsonFairy
